tool.name: p0sixspwn
tool.description: p0sixspwn is a utility by winocm, iH8sn0w, and SquiffyPwn that provides an untethered jailbreak of iOS 6.1.3 through iOS 6.1.6.

tool.name: evasi0n7
tool.description: evasi0n7 is a utility by the evad3rs that provides an untethered jailbreak of iOS 7.0 through iOS 7.0.6.

tool.name: evasi0n
tool.description: evasi0n is a utility by the evad3rs that provides an untethered jailbreak of iOS 6.0 through iOS 6.1.2.

tool.name: pangu
tool.description: Pangu is a utility by the Chinese Pangu Team that provides an untethered jailbreak of iOS 7.1 through iOS 7.1.2.
